Post-Match Reflections: India captain Rohit Sharma was dejected after the hosts failed to defend the 209 as Australia sealed a 1-0 series lead in Mohali.
Rohit praised the batters for posting a 200-plus score while adding that the bowlers were not up to the mark and the fielding did not help as well.
The Indian captain further mentioned that the dew was not a big factor and credited Australia for the way they batted.
